concept.title: Tutorial Overview
concept.shortdesc: This tutorial shows you how to create a pipeline. You can optionally download sample data so you can preview data as you configure the pipeline and then run the completed pipeline and monitor the results.

conbody.p: You can use the basic or extended version of the tutorial. The basic version allows you to read and write to a local file system so you can use tutorial data to run the pipeline. The extended version requires an Elasticsearch destination system to run the pipeline. If you don't use Elasticsearch, you can still follow along to the end without running the pipeline.
The basic tutorial evaluates fare payment data from a taxi company. It evaluates the credit cards used for payment to find the less-used vendors, so they might be dropped to reduce overhead.
